mapper.select: SELECT sysuser.* ,sysrole.role_id FROM sys_user sysuser LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sysuserrole ON sysuser.user_id = sysuserrole.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sysrole ON sysrole.role_id = sysuserrole.role_id WHERE sysuser.login_pass = #{login_pass} AND ( sysuser.login_account = #{login_account} OR sysuser.user_phone = #{login_account} )

SELECT sysauthority.* ,sysrole.role_id ,sysrole.role_key FROM sys_authority sysauthority , sys_role_authority sysroleauthority , sys_role sysrole , sys_user_role sysuserrole where sysrole.role_id = sysuserrole.role_id and sysrole.role_key = sysroleauthority.role_key and sysauthority.menu_code = sysroleauthority.menu_code and sysuserrole.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY sysauthority.id ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_role sysrole WHERE sysrole.role_id IN ( SELECT sysuserrole.role_id FROM sys_user_role sysuserrole WHERE sysuserrole.user_id = #{user_id} ) AND sysrole.delete_flag = 1

SELECT sysuser.user_id ,sysuser.login_account ,sysuser.login_pass ,sysuser.user_name ,sysuser.user_head ,sysuser.user_phone ,sysuser.user_email ,sysuser.user_sex ,sysuser.user_birthday ,sysuser.register_time ,(SELECT user_name from sys_user tmpsysuser where tmpsysuser.user_id = sysuser.user_id) create_by_user_name ,sysuser.create_by ,sysuser.real_name ,sysuser.store_id ,sysstore.store_name ,sysrole.role_value ,sysrole.role_id FROM sys_user sysuser LEFT JOIN sys_store sysstore ON sysuser.store_id = sysstore.store_id AND sysstore.store_deleted = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sysuserrole ON sysuserrole.user_id = sysuser.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sysrole ON sysrole.role_id = sysuserrole.role_id WHERE sysuser.store_id = #{store_id}
AND sysstore.store_name like concat(concat('%',#{store_name}),'%')
AND sysuser.user_name like concat(concat('%',#{user_name}),'%')
AND sysuser.user_phone like concat(concat('%',#{user_phone}),'%')
AND unix_timestamp( sysuser.register_time ) > unix_timestamp(#{start_time})
AND unix_timestamp( sysuser.register_time ) < unix_timestamp(#{end_time})
ORDER BY is_shop_keeper ASC ,sysuser.register_time DESC
SELECT sysrolepermission.* FROM sys_role_permission sysrolepermission , sys_user_role sysuserrole where sysrolepermission.role_id = sysuserrole.role_id and sysuserrole.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE sys_user, sys_user_role FROM sys_user left JOIN sys_user_role ON sys_user.user_id = sys_user_role.user_id WHERE sys_user.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT sysauthority.* ,sysrole.role_id ,sysrole.role_key FROM sys_role sysrole INNER JOIN sys_role_authority sysroleauthority ON sysrole.role_key = sysroleauthority.role_key INNER JOIN sys_authority sysauthority ON sysauthority.menu_code = sysroleauthority.menu_code WHERE sysrole.role_id = #{role_id} ORDER BY sysauthority.id ASC
mapper.insert: DELETE FROM `sys_role_authority` WHERE menu_code = #{menu_code} AND role_key IN ( SELECT role_key FROM sys_role sysrole WHERE sysrole.role_id = #{role_id} )

INSERT INTO sys_role ( role_key ,create_time ,description ,role_value ,create_by_user_id ,delete_flag ) SELECT (max(role_key) + 1) ,sysdate() ,#{description} ,#{role_value} ,#{create_by_user_id} ,0 FROM sys_role
mapper.delete: DELETE sys_role, sys_role_authority FROM sys_role left JOIN sys_role_authority ON sys_role.role_key = sys_role_authority.role_key WHERE sys_role.role_id = #{role_id}
